title: I'm Singing a Song for You

tokens.lyric: I'm singing a song for you
If you're happy, then you can sing too.

lines.raw: [Bb]If you're happy, then you can sing too.

tokens.lyric: And the whole world will be happy too.

lines.raw: [C7]And the whole world will be happy too.

tokens.lyric: We can change the world if we work together,

lines.raw: [A]We can change the world if we work together,

tokens.lyric: We can change the world if we give our hearts out

lines.raw: [B7]We can change the world if we give our hearts out

tokens.lyric: Showing others that we really care.
We can make the sun shine everyday,

lines.raw: [A]We can make the sun shine everyday,

tokens.lyric: If we let our light shine, there will be no night-time

lines.raw: [B7]If we let our light shine, there will be no night-time

tokens.lyric: And everyone will join us as we sing.

lines.raw: [E]And everyone will join us as we sing.

tokens.lyric: Children of the world let us work together,

lines.raw: [A]Children of the world let us work together,

tokens.lyric: We can do it if we only try.

lines.raw: [E]We can do it if we only try.

tokens.lyric: We will love each other, live in peace together,

lines.raw: [B7]We will love each other, live in peace together,

tokens.lyric: Yes, we'll do it if we only try.

lines.raw: [E]Yes, we'll do it if we only try.
